# activeMicrophoneMode

**Type Property**

The device’s active microphone mode.

## Declaration

```swift
class var activeMicrophoneMode: AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode { get }
```

## Discussion

The value may differ from the value of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/preferredMicrophoneMode] property if the app’s active audio route doesn’t support the mode.

This property is key-value observable.

## Inspecting the microphone mode

- **preferredMicrophoneMode**: The microphone mode that the user selects in Control Center.
- **AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode**: Constants that define the available microphone modes.
